description:
Kid the Phantom Thief literally rises to the occasion when old man Jirokichi of the Suzuki conglomerate throws down the gauntlet. But with Detective Conan as part of the security team guarding the Blue Wonder jewel, will Kaito finally get his wings clipped?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: KIDvsコナン 奇跡の空中歩行
Kid VS Conan : la miraculeuse lévitation
Kid vs Conan: Kiseki no Kuuchuu Hikou
